highlights.headline: Rockies secure first series win in 22 attempts
highlights.description: Brenton Doyle tracks down the ball and makes an impressive grab to secure the Rockies' first series win in 22 tries.

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Rockies secure first series win in 22 attempts) 2025/06/03 ESHEET

headlines.description: — The Colorado Rockies ended a streak of 22 consecutive series losses dating to last year, beating the Miami Marlins 3-2 Tuesday night as Hunter Goodman homered for the third time in two games.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rockies snap streak of 22 straight series losses dating to '24 with 3-2 win over Marlins

headlines.description: — TJ Friedl made a leaping catch in center field for the final out to rob pinch-hitter Jake Bauers of a tying home run, and the Cincinnati Reds rallied for a 4-2 victory that snapped the Milwaukee Brewers’ eight-game winning streak Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Friedl makes game-saving grab and Reds rally to snap Brewers' 8-game streak with 4-2 win
